column5: We are heading up to Cedar in 3 weeks. This is the one by Perrault Falls. Curious about water temps and if anyone has been there lately. I would think that fish are deep right now. Any info is appreciated.
I would suggest going to the website of the Lodges on Cedar and see if they have any reports..
Thanks Glenman12, already did, just looking for fresh, non resort information. I do value that also, but would like others opinions.

Been out the last couple of weeks on cedar.fishing is awesome.guided thete teus.10 dz minnows gone by 2:00.was 32c out pretty hot.now temps sre perfect.been great fishing all year as long as you know where.
Cedar Lake Lodge has a Facebook page that they update every few days...https://www.facebook.com/pages/Cedar...23690931036142
